title: Imaclava pembertoni
text:
Imaclava pembertoni is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a marine <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Drilliidae">Drilliidae</a>.
Description.
The length of the shell varies between 25 mm and 42 mm.
Distribution.
This species occurs in the <a href="Sea%20of%20Cortez">Sea of Cortez</a>, Western Mexico
